name: Glitter Puff - Magica Exam
description:
It's time to transform and get ready to shoot. The Magica Exam is here and we need to pass it in order to become Magica Girls!

Join Malin and Helene on their endeavor to become Magica Girls.

Glitter puff is a 360 bullet hell auto scrolling shooter.
